**Rewind Pendant:** A wearable device that captures everything you say and hear and then transcribes, encrypts, and stores is entirely locally on your phone.
- [website](https://www.rewind.ai/pendant)

**Silentio:** A device that blocks all device recordings, using ultrasound to detect and block any microphone that tries to capture your voice.
- [NEC: Speaker Selective Cancellation via Neural Enhanced Ultrasound Shadowing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.05848v1)
